Plot: Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession.
Title: Summer Hours
Actors: Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling, Jérémie Renier, Edith Scob
tomatoConsensus: Olivier Assayas' contemplative family drama handles lofty ideas about art and culture with elegance and lightness.
